commentBody:
This video is a fabulous idea. "Say it to my face" is what these journalists are showing men. Obviously, the men reading these cruel words didn't write them, but I wonder if the writers could actually say these things to these women's faces; I think not.

I'm not a celebrity, I'm married and in my 50s, so I can check my internet and check my social media account without these problems, or so I think. Yes, it's so much easier to communicate, but the anonymity of social media has made us meaner, so much meaner.
